mapper.select: select count(*) from t_message where state = 0 and deleteState = 0 and receiveUserId = #{receiveUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select u.id as u_id, u.avatarUrl as u_avatarUrl, u.nickname as u_nickname, u.gender as u_gender, m.id, m.postUserId, m.receiveUserId, m.content, m.state, m.createTime, m.updateTime from t_message m, t_user u where m.postUserId = u.id and m.deleteState = 0 and m.receiveUserId = #{receiveUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by m.createTime desc, m.state asc
